item.title: Using dnsmasq with networkManager in Ubuntu
item.description: Overview Remote work increased since covid-19 appears. The VPN appliances turned crucial devices and employees are using more than ever their companies internal services. VPN connections often setting a custom DNS server, your internal DNS server, in order to resolve hostnames or services of the internal company.
